subtitle: at a special commission of oyer and terminer held at Justice-College, in W---ck-Lane, before Sir Asculapius Dosem, Dr. Timberhead, and others, their fellows, justices, &c.
title: The charge to the jury, or, The sum of the evidence, on the trial of A.B., C.D., and E.F., all M.D. for the death of one Robert at Orfud
other_titles: Sum of the evidence, on the trial of A.B., C.D., and E.F., all M.D. for the death of one Robert at Orfud
publishers: Printed for M. Cooper, at the Globe in Pater-noster-Row

notes.value:
Anonymous. By Henry Fielding.  Cf. ESTC.

"Advertised as by Henry Fielding in Sarah Fielding's Cleopatra and Octavia, 2nd ed. 1758"--W.L. Cross, The History of Henry Fielding, v. 3, p. 338.

Signatures: [A]² B-G⁴ (last leaf blank).

"Advertisement. Shortly will be published Catalogus librorum in arte medica praestantium, or, a catalogue of choice books in the art of physic...": p. 23-25; "A project for the advancement of physic in this island, by abolishing the Coll. &c. [i.e. The Royal College of Physicians]": p. 27-46.

ESTC T89859
